scripts.coverage: npm run build && istanbul cover dist/test
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:test
scripts.build:lib: mkdirp dist/lib && babel --optional runtime lib --out-dir dist/lib
scripts.build:dist: mkdirp dist && babel --optional runtime lib --out-dir dist
scripts.build:test: mkdirp dist/test && babel --optional runtime test --out-dir dist/test
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build:dist
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && REPORTER=true node dist/test | tap-dot
